metadata.name: CLOÜDFECTION
metadata.description:
CLOÜDFECTION (CLOÜD-FEK-SHUN),N.(16C):
The invasion and growth of germs in the body. The germs can be good or evil depending on the source. An CLOÜDFECTION can cause depression, anger or high states of joy depending on the germ. The infection is strong but only temporary. This is an example of a bad CLOÜDFECTION. Just like any infection, it can be cured with medicine, therapy or love.
